name: Beef Steak
description: Tender grilled beef steak served with a side of mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

name: Beef Stew
description: Hearty beef stew slow-cooked with carrots, potatoes, and aromatic herbs, served with crusty bread.

name: Beef Burger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and your choice of cheese, served in a soft bun.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Flavorful shredded beef wrapped in soft corn tortillas, garnished with salsa, cilantro, and lime.

name: Beef Fajitas
description: Sizzling beef strips marinated in spices, served with bell peppers, onions, tortillas, and condiments.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
description: Savory beef slices stir-fried with a mix of fresh vegetables in a tangy soy-based sauce.

name: Beef Kebabs
description: Skewered pieces of marinated beef grilled to perfection, served with rice and a side salad.

name: Beef Pot Roast
description: Slow-roasted beef pot roast with carrots, potatoes, and gravy, a comfort food classic.
